thread.title: The "Price is Right" for NYC and this location!
thread.title_full: The "Price is Right" for NYC and this location! - Review of Avalon Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: JimPerlow
title: The "Price is Right" for NYC and this location!
text:
We were concerned when we booked this hotel as we have been to NYC and paid a lot more for a room that we did not use that much. The room did not have a view but was very quiet as it was not on the street side. It was very clean and a generous size with a great bathroom with a double sink and separate shower and bath with good water pressure. All of the staff were very nice and helpful.
Room Tip: Rooms not facing the street are very quiet. See more room tips
